attributes.action: bring back cheetos to the uk!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i used to eat cheetos everyday i miss them so much and was gutted when i found out they werent going to be sold anymore, i do not understand why they have stopped selling them it is unacceptable.. i LOVE cheetos and am outraged that the have not yet made a return to the uk,i will be waiting untill my call is heard i will not rest ever until cheetos come back into my life and are sold in the uk i used to enjoy my life until the day hell broke loose when my mother told me cheetos were no longer being sold! this is not hate mail i just want my call to be heard im so so so positive i could get over a million people to join my petiton to bring back cheetos!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
